headline: Overdeveloped Organs
description: A surreal drawing exploring excess, burden, and endurance. Vivid colors stretch against winter-like repetition, echoing the phase of Echo Moon.

associatedMedia.description: A colorful, surreal drawing resembling overlapping organs and abstract forms.
